name: The Origin of Life on Earth - hbt10-sp001
description: The Origin of Life on Earth screen print on paper  8 x 10 inches  hbt10-sp001 Edition of 50  2010  The Origin of Life on Earth is a single color screen print by Hollis Brown Thornton. The prints are in an edition of fifty, signed and numbered. The paper is a standard size of 8 x 10 inches, with an image window of 5 x 7 inches, for easy framing. These prints are made in house, at Hollis Brown Thornton Studio. Kept out of direct sunlight and framed under UV plexi, the image will last indefinitely. The work is on American Masters 250 GSM paper, 100% cotton rag, acid free, close to poster board thickness. The work is stored flat. Shipping The work is shipped flat in an archival plastic sleeve in a cardboard mailer. Shipping costs for orders in the United States are a flat rate of $4.00 (for one or more prints), and international shipments are a flat rate of $8.00 (for one or more prints). Note: The images include the full 8 1/2 x 11 inch front of the print and a photograph of the print in a frame. The frame is not included in the purchase, though it may be purchased below.

name: Darth Vader
description: Darth Vader pigment transfer on paper 9 1/4 x 11 1/4 inches (image 8 1/4 x 10 1/4 inches) 2013 Darth Vader is a pigment transfer by Hollis Brown Thornton. The transfer process essentially transfers the pigment from a photocopy to another surface with acrylic paint. A detailed step-by-step is available HERE. The print is signed on the front and titled on the back, with a 1/2 inch border on each side of the image. Kept out of direct sunlight, the image will last indefinitely. The work is on American Masters 250 GSM paper, 100% cotton rag, acid free, close to poster board thickness. Shipping The work is shipped flat in an archival plastic sleeve in a cardboard mailer. Shipping costs are included for orders in the United States. For international shipment, $10 shipping for the first print and free shipping for any additional prints.
